lead_paragraph: Miss Shepherd, a woman of uncertain origins, "temporarily" parks her van in a man's London driveway. Over the course of fifteen years, what began as a begrudged favor turns into a relationship that will change both their lives. Based on a true story and Alan Bennett's stage play "The Lady in the Van."
